ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Patchy Fog
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 9pm, then patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
